page.title: 08CHURCHES
page.content: BEFORE THE CHURCH WAS SITUATED WHERE IT IS NOW THERE WAS A CHAPEL ON THE GREEN IN THE CENTRE OF THE VILLAGE.THE MAIN SERVICES ARE ON THE FIRST AND THIRD SUNDAY IN EVERY MONTH ONE IS HOLY COMMUNION AND THE OTHER EVENSONG. AT HARVEST TIME IN OCTOBER WE HAVE A FESTIVAL AND DECORATE THE CHURCH WITH FRUIT,VEGETABLES,BREAD AND EGGS.THE NIGHT AFTER WE AUCTION THE PRODUCE FOR CHURCH FUNDS.St.MICHEAL AND ALL ANGELS HAS BEEN RESTORED IN THE LAST THREE YEARS.IT HAS BEEN RE-ROOFED AND RE-POINTED AND DECORATED,THIS COST AROUND Â£16,000.THE PEOPLE IN THE VILLAGE RAISED FUNDS TO PAY FOR IT.ON SHELDON DAY THIS YEAR THERE WAS AN EXHIBITION IN CHURCH OF OLD MINING TOOLS AND CLOTHING,FARMING TOOLS,OLD CLOTHING AND HOUSEHOLD BITS AND PIECES.
